charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_0100:
Such vastness...
Humanity cannot even begin to compare to the
enormity of the ocean.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_0400: How about it? Come gaze at the ocean with me.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_0600:
Well, you’re a cautious one, aren’t you.
Won’t approach me that easily, huh?
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0301_0700: You’re a bad person, aren’t you.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_0800:
Heh. You certainly have guts, talking to me
like that.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_1000:
Don’t worry too much about it. I’m just enjoying
the view right now.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1100:
I understand that you don’t trust me. It’s not like
you’re hiding it.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1200:
You’re right in thinking that I’m not a good man.
But I take no pleasure in hurting people for
no reason.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1300:
Especially Trainers who show so much promise,
such as yourself.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1400: You don’t have anything to worry about...for now.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_1600: Hmph. Just up to one of my sinister plans.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_1800: Hmph. Just up to one of my sinister plans.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1900:
And Mewtwo is my ultimate tool for realizing
those plans.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2000: Ah, look at the rage in your eyes!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2100: It must really bother you that I call Pokémon tools.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2200:
I wonder how angry you would be if I were to
make you and your Pokémon into accessories to
my misdeeds.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2300: You wouldn’t let that slide, would you?
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_2500:
I like your gusto, kid! I knew you had something
special about you!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0302_2600: You’d never get away with it!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_2700:
I like your gusto, kid! I knew you had something
special about you!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2800: I have great expectations for your future.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2900:
The two of you will undoubtedly become strong
enough to oppose me someday.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3000:
Hmph. I look forward to that day. Will you be an
obstacle that hinders me...?
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3100:
Or maybe you’ll join me and willingly become
my tool.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_3300:
Hmph. We’ll see... We have plenty of time
until then.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_3500:
Hmph. We’ll see... We have plenty of time
until then.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3600:
I’m looking forward to seeing what you do with
your future.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3700: But until that day, you and I are just Trainers.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3800: I’ll keep on exploring with you, for the time being.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3900:
What were we talking about again?
Right, gazing at the ocean.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4000: Take a good look while you can, kid.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4100:
Before you know it, everything you see here will
belong to me!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4200: If you want to win it all back from me...
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4300:
you’d better not hold anything back when you
battle me!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4400: I like those who show strength!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4500:
I sincerely look forward to you becoming strong
enough to face me!
